channel.title: Zangetsu Villaging looking for Shinobis
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Zangetsu Villaging looking for Shinobis"

item.title: Re: Zangetsu Villaging looking for Shinobis
item.content:encoded:
We now have 42 Upgrades, are summoning kaijus and Burgers are available.
We need three or more people to start zombja.

So if u need Z Points or if you just wanna hit some Zombjas come to us.

Your appliance is also very welcome if you look for an active community and a fast growing village which helps you to become a great shinobi yourself.

Looking forward to welcome you in Zangetsu Village.

P.S. If you come in the next few days, the first 5 persons get a Monsterdrop for free which you can choose from a list.

item.title: Zangetsu Villaging looking for Shinobis
item.content:encoded:
Hi there
A long time ago the Kaiju Drizz made his way to the realms. Unfortunately he did not found a new village but helped out others to get to the realm.

But now ages later, this time passed by and the Drizz is know settling down and begins a new with a lovely charmed village.

Zangetsu the Village hidden in the zanpoktu is because of that looking now for old, young and alternate Ninjas who like to help biuld up a village and get everything we need to be lucky together.

The firsts to come have a special seat in the council.

So if u'd like to help Drizz or just join a new but fast growing village just send a application.

I, the Drizz would be very glad to welcome you to my village
